com.learn.elasticsearch.query

类 BaseQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.learn.elasticsearch.query.BaseQuery
  • 直接已知子类:
    BoolQuery, FulltextQuery, GeoQuery, TermsQuery

    public abstract class BaseQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the abstract class for query action.
